basic.production: Adjacent areas of Hubei, Chongqing, Hunan
basic.blooming: Flowering period February, fruiting period November
basic.color: Leaf color light green, fruit color green, dark brown

maintenance.soil: Acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning accordingly for any favorate tree shapes
